title: Voice Reminders for Medication and Appointments
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set up voice-activated reminders for my patients' medications and appointments so that I can efficiently monitor their care without interrupting my patient interactions.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Alerts – Historical Data Trends for Health Metrics
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to analyze historical health data and receive real-time alerts on patient health metrics so that I can anticipate deterioration, plan interventions, and provide timely care to my rural patients.

title: Asynchronous Communication for Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to send quick voice messages to my patients and their families so that I can communicate efficiently without interrupting my care routines.

title: Voice Command Shortcuts for Health Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use voice command shortcuts to quickly access patient health data so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and respond to their needs without interrupting my workflow.

title: Multimodal Interaction for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to interact with the ALFRED system using voice commands and touch gestures so that I can efficiently monitor patient health and manage care tasks without interrupting my patient interactions.

title: Context-Aware Assistance for Emotional Support
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to adapt its responses based on my patients' emotional states so that I can provide more empathetic and personalized care.
